titles.title: Los Padres National Forest Conservation Act
To withdraw the Los Padres National Forest in California from location, entry, and patent under mining laws, and for other purposes.
Los Padres National Forest Conservation Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Mineral Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Forests and Forest Health.

bill.summary: Los Padres National Forest Conservation Act - Withdraws the Los Padres National Forest in California from: (1) all forms of entry, appropriation, and disposal under the public land laws; and (2) location, entry, and patent under the mining laws; and (3) operation of the mineral leasing, mineral materials, and geothermal leasing laws.
